raw_comment:
1. I noticed that this graph shows the players and coaches of color for major sports leagues. 
2. I wonder why the baseball league doesn't have as high of a percentage of players of color as the other leagues. I wonder how many league members are not included in these results, since the data is self-reported.  
3. This shows how open my community is in making sports leagues more diverse. It impacts the way diversity is shown through sports. 
4. The graph is basically demonstrating the percentage of players and coaches of color in major sports leagues. A catchy headline would be "Diversity: High or Low Percentage in Major Sports Leagues"
ace_sentences: The graph shows the players of color in major sports leagues.
The graph shows the coaches of color in major sports leagues.
The baseball league is a major sports league.
I wonder why the baseball league does not have as high a percentage of players of color as other leagues.
I wonder how many league members are not included in these results.
My community is open to making sports leagues more diverse.
This graph shows how open my community is.
This impacts the way diversity is shown through sports.
The graph demonstrates the percentage of players of color in major sports leagues.
The graph demonstrates the percentage of coaches of color in major sports leagues.
The headline is: Diversity: High or Low Percentage in Major Sports Leagues.
